text: Pita ayɨp Jon ayɨp Jisas kumɨl tɨkjakak takaw ak binɨb kɨlop agñɨleknɨŋ, bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok sek, bɨ God agnɨgep kal awl polis bɨawl okok sek, bɨ Sajusi okok sek, kɨli takaw agɨlek anɨb ak nɨgɨlak. Nɨŋɨd, binɨb ogɨnap kumɨl ma tɨkjakɨpal anɨb ak taynen takaw anɨb ak agñebil agɨl mɨlɨk nɨgɨlak.
